job.title: Sr Loan Processor
job.description:
If you are a Sr Loan Processor with experience, please read on!
This is a fully remote job, we are an expanding, award winning, and employee focused mortgage company. Due to the growth of our company and our services, we are in need of a Sr Loan Processor, that possesses strong experience in encompass, FHA, and VA.
If you are interested in joining an established company, that continues to grow in the mortgage industry, please apply immediately!
What You Will Be Doing
You will be responsible for assembling, administering and processing loan applications, while working close with underwriters to ensure our customers have a smooth mortgage process.
What You Need for this Position
What's In It for You
So, if you are a Sr Loan Processor with experience, please apply today!
Or you can email me directly, at thomas.stampley@cybercoders.com
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Thomas.Stampley@CyberCoders.com
Thomas Stampley - Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
